column4: hello guys.im planning to reformat my hd.how to copy the updates that ive downloaded?so that if i reinstall the os, ill not re-download again the updates. thanks
: i will copy the folder "archives" , pgkcache.bin and srcpkgcache.bin?
dont need those two files really, but copy them anyway
: cp: cannot stat `/var/cache/apt/*.deb': No such file or directory
: i will copy it to my usb.
: but error cp: cannot stat `/var/cache/apt/*.deb': No such file or directory
: cp: cannot stat `/var/cache/apt/archives*.deb': No such file or directory
: its not working  cp /var/cache/apt/archives/*deb /path/to/media/Rhea500 cp: target `/path/to/media/Rhea500' is not a directory
you gotta subsitute path/to/media with the real path where you want to backup to
